overview: Alexander (65), is a Uruguayan living in Vienna (Austria), who during the sanitary isolation has developed a special relationship with his pillow. "Pillow" shows the routine and loneliness of a human being who finds in this everyday object a poetic way of going beyond the physical to face the mysteries of life. At the same time "Pillow" pays homage to Albrecht Dürer, and his sketch "Six Studies of Pillows" (1493) and the famous Viennese waltz "The Blue Danube" by Strauss.
tagline: The only dreams that cannot be fulfilled, are those that you did not dream of.
title: Pillow
